column2:
"Nice work!
Sorry for asking you to do
something so tough!"

"...yeah, I see.
So there were a substantial
number of Mech after all."

"Mmm, that one with a strange child has
been in some of the reports from everyone... Isn't this frightening?"
"It seems like they're being called to the residential area against their will, and I've got a bad feeling about this!"

"Oh that's right, here is your reward!
Thanks! Until next time!"
